## Project: Ajeet Singh Personal Profile Website
- React + Vite with Tailwind CSS
- Features: Hero, About, Geographic Journey Map, Timelines, Family Section
- Enhanced with: Background patterns, animated elements, SVG graphics, family photo gallery
- Status: Complete and Running
- URL: http://localhost:5173/
